name: Paladin and Soul
description:
Paladin and Soul™
Welcome to Paladin and Soul.

You've always been an entrepreneur and now is your chance!

As COVID-19 ravages the world, we created a game where you have to collect crowns and coins but be sure that you reflection does the same!

This game was created by TheLast Shoguns™, which was formed for Weekly Game Jam week 148

Roba - Leader & 2D Pixel Artist
https://roba07.itch.io/

DesrtFeng - Programmer

https://itch.io/profile/desertfeng

Don4t45 - Musician
https://itch.io/profile/don4t45

Thank you for your support. We look forward to your votes and are sure that you will enjoy this game.

You controlled two foxes , they act in mirror way.
Control both of them and get the toppest platform to win

Controls:

left-right arrows: Move the character.

W : jump / super jump(in air)
SPACE: change the view.
S: crouch and active the ice platform .
J L : move actived platform.

Built for Microsoft Windows.
